actionConfiguration.body: SELECT products.* FROM products inner join "orderProductMap" on products."id" = "orderProductMap"."productId" where "orderProductMap"."orderId" = {{ordersTable.selectedRow.id}} ORDER BY "id" LIMIT 10;

SELECT products.* FROM products inner join "orderProductMap" on products."id" = "orderProductMap"."productId" where "orderProductMap"."orderId" = {{ordersTable.selectedRow.id}} ORDER BY "id" LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM orders where "userId"={{usersTable.selectedRow.id}} ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM orders where "userId"={{usersTable.selectedRow.id}} ORDER BY id

UPDATE user_data SET name = '{{nameInput.text}}', country = '{{addressInput.text}}', email = '{{emailInput.text}}', "phone" = '{{phoneInput.text}}', gender = '{{gender_select.selectedOptionValue}}' WHERE id = {{usersTable.selectedRow.id}}

SELECT * FROM user_data where email ilike '%{{usersTable.searchText}}%' ORDER BY id LIMIT {{usersTable.pageSize}} offset {{(usersTable.pageNo - 1) * usersTable.pageSize}}
